Function Documentation

bool getCoordAndAngle (  const NParam *  param,
MC2Coordinate &  coord,
uint16 &  angle
) 
 

Get a coordinate and angle.

If param is NULL nothing is done and if param is less than 10 bytes no angle is read.

bool getMC2CoordAndAngle (  const NParam *  param,
MC2Coordinate &  coord,
uint16 &  angle
) 
 

Get a coordinate and angle.

If param is NULL nothing is done and if param is less than 10 bytes no angle is read. This method can only be used when the parameter is sent as a MC2 coordinate.
